paragraph: CALL 212-235-1197 OR **SCHEDULE A FREE CONSULTATION** TO GET STARTED
valueProp: We know that there are a lot of firms you can choose from to handle your case. However, we are the only firm that has a reputation for being as diligent, thorough and committed to your success. When you choose Edelman & Edelman, P.C., you know that everything possible will be done to secure the best available outcome for you and your family.
